content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm pleased to meet you. The rental price I'm offering is €1,200 per month. Remember, I'm open to negotiations, so please feel free to make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: The apartment is nice, but the rental price is a bit high for me. I am a student, so I have a limited budget. I am willing to pay €800 per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your honesty. However, €800 per month is too low for this apartment. I'm willing to be flexible but not to that extent. Let's meet somewhere in the middle, say €1,000 per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position. But €1,000 per month is still too much for me. I can offer €900 per month. I am willing to sign a two-year contract and I am a dependable tenant.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: €900 per month is still not acceptable to me, Yi-Nuo Wang. However, considering your willingness to sign a two-year contract and your apparent reliability, I'm willing to meet you halfway again. How about €950 per month? That's as low as I can go.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your consideration. I appreciate that you are willing to meet me halfway. I accept your offer of €950 per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of [950] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
